action.name: dRail
action.desc: The player's health is depleted and they slide back as if on subway tracks.

action.name: dStop
action.desc: The player's health is depleted and they are frozen, flashing between grayscale and color.

action.name: dBoss
action.desc: The player's health is depleted and they simply stand, flashing red.

action.name: dFall
action.desc: The player's health is depleted, they flash red, and `Bummer!` appears above their head, as if they fell through a hole.

action.name: dDamage
action.desc: The player's health is depleted and they are thrown back and lie down, flashing red.

action.name: god
action.desc: No visible changes. Probably leftover from debugging purposes but disabled.

action.name: test
action.desc: Player hops in midair. Equivalent to `sky`. Probably for debugging purposes.

action.name: nMare
action.desc: Player lies down and shakes, as if having a nightmare.

action.name: stepback
action.desc: Player moves back quickly.

action.name: sipped
action.desc: Player flies up very fast.

action.name: blstd
action.desc: Player lies down with dust coming up from the ground, as if knocked out.

action.name: bedWake
action.desc: Player sits up, as if having woke up from a bed.

action.name: bedLie
action.desc: Player lays down, as if in a bed.

action.name: bedSleep
action.desc: Player lays down, as if in a bed, and has 'Z's floating from their mouth.

action.name: toYellow
action.desc: Player looks as if hit and flashes between visible and invisible.

action.name: catch
action.desc: Player blinks.

action.name: oppo
action.desc: Player has their back turned to the screen.

action.name: wndr
action.desc: Player looks as if hit.

action.name: exclam
action.desc: A '!' character appears above the player's head.

action.name: quest
action.desc: A '?' character appears above the player's head.

action.name: comojump
action.desc: Player jumps.

action.name: run
action.desc: Player runs in their current direction.

action.name: back
action.desc: Player moves back slowly.

action.name: walk
action.desc: Player walks in their current direction.

action.name: warpOut
action.desc: The player is stretched, as if exiting a teleporter.

action.name: warpIn
action.desc: The player is squashed, as if entering a teleporter.

action.name: 1step
action.desc: Player takes one step in their current direction.

action.name: getItem
action.desc: Player looks up, as if receiving an item.

action.name: useLP
action.desc: Player looks as if drinking from a Life Pot (although the animation does not show or create one) and flashes dark pink momentarily.

action.name: hide
action.desc: Player disappears.

action.name: lie
action.desc: Player lies down, but not as if they are in a bed.

action.name: stop
action.desc: Player stops whatever animation sequence they were in. This has different effects depending on what animation they were doing, but generally ends any 'extra-effects' of an animation, rather than the main part.

action.name: sky
action.desc: Player hops in midair.

action.name: nrml
action.desc: Player completely exits whatever animation sequence they were in. This includes both 'extra-effects' and the main part. This also returns user input to the user.
